text: 1:23 Amos 4:11; Sekaraia 3:2-5; Rom 11:14; 1 Korin 3:15; Akar Mogomem 3:4Marazi avimɨn iti moghɨn iti, kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia zuamɨram avimɨn me inigh. Ezɨ marazi bar navir ghurimɨn arazibagh ami, egha me bar mɨze, ezɨ men korotiaba uaghan bar mɨze. Eghtɨ dughiar ia men apangkuviba, ia Godɨn atiatingɨva uari bagh gan. Ia Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzezir bizir kaba bar dar saghon ikɨ.
